attributes.action: Use the olympic village as MP second home accomodation from 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parliament should lease the Olympic village after 2012 and use the competitors accommodation for MP's to stay instead of allowing them to have a second home.  This would send a clear signal to the country and significantly reduce the running costs of parliament.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
